name: hashlock-verify
on:
  pull_request:
    paths:
      - '**/*.yaml.txt'
      - '**/*.json.txt'
      - 'scripts/*.py.txt'
      - '.github/workflows/hashlock-verify.yaml.txt'
jobs:
  hashlock:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with: { python-version: '3.11' }
      - name: Install deps
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install blake3
      - name: Generate current hashlock
        run: |
          python scripts/normalize_and_hash.py.txt .
          cp output/hashlock.json output/hashlock.current.json
      - name: Compare with baseline if exists
        run: |
          if [ -f output/hashlock.baseline.json ]; then
            python scripts/detect_drift.py.txt output/hashlock.baseline.json output/hashlock.current.json
          else
            echo "No baseline; creating baseline from current."
            cp output/hashlock.current.json output/hashlock.baseline.json
          fi
      - name: Upload artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: hashlock-reports
          path: output/
